0.description: Multi-purpose living zone with a sofa facing a TV on a low table, backed by a bookshelf; includes a window-side countertop with four stools, a side table, decorative curtain, and a backpack on the floor

1.description: Sleeping corner with a single bed topped by pillows, accompanied by a nightstand, towel rack, laundry basket, storage cabinet, and a guitar leaning against the cabinet

2.description: Workspace featuring a desk and small side table next to built-in cabinets, with a wall clock overhead, curtains for light control, a tissue box on the cabinet, and a floor trashcan

4.description: Compact bathroom with a walk-in shower, wall-mounted sink, standard toilet, frosted window for ventilation, and a digital floor scale

5.description: Functional kitchen area with continuous countertops framed by upper and lower cabinets, a built-in refrigerator and microwave, plus a toaster oven, toaster, dishrack, and two floor-level trashcans
